title: Zee27
author: Zee27
content: I just joined the King's Cup Invitational 2023 Spot Trading Competition, but it requires a team comprising of 5 members to be able to participate fully and I need a few more people to make up a team.To verify the legitimacy of the event, I have provided the necessary link below so that if you'd like to collaborate with me, you'd be well informed. My team link https://www.bitget.com/events/kcgi/spot?teamId=1297&uuid=4686196454&clacCode=CQVQ8HUPDetails of the event https://www.bitget.com/support/articles/12560603796558You can form your own team if you wish to, its not compulsory to team up with me although I'll very much appreciate it if you do. I have also provided the link for that.https://www.bitget.com/events/kcgi/spotDisclaimer:This is solely a trading event and I'm not compelling anyone to join, do so at your own freewill. Also, please be nice in the comments if you decide not to .

comments.author: R1dwanRz

Also, please be nice in the comments if you decide not to . Â I've checked the links you provided, it seems like a real deal. I understand that you're looking for people to collaborate with you since you seem to be the only one on your team but I've got my own trading group and I could also collaborate with them instead since I'm more familiar with them. Don't feel bad that I'm not joining your team tho.

This is a genuine question.Â ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚I understand your question. Well, I wouldn't know why amongst all the other prize rewards, (I'm sure you saw others including USDT rewards worth millions of dollars yeah?) a helicopter was included but the thing is, if I have my team set up, we could agree beforehand to sell it and split the cash. That's like the only way to share a helicopter reward between 5 different people who possibly resides in different locations and regions. Does this makes sense?

comments.author: Abigi
comments.body: I know too well that exchanges often reserve interesting rewards for trading competitions but a chopper is overboard lol. Personally I'd ask for the cash equivalent if I won, would that be granted?
